attributes.action: A petition to stop petitions against the EU democratic referendum and a re-vote.
attributes.additional_details: To refrain from further petitions against a democratic process born out of the current governments promises.
attributes.background: It is currently placing strain on the already chaotic EU debate and process especially after our duly elected leader following a democratic process has resigned after a referendum he proposed after the decision didn't go the way he hoped, Instead of manning up and leading the country forward.
